meta_description: Enjoy live Victorian Theatre events, unique programs and workshops, or a tour of the Victorian house and gardens for a glimpse into our past. (215) 438-1861
hours_text:
## Welcome to Ebenezer Maxwell Mansion

200 West Tulpehocken Street, Philadelphia, PA 19144

#### Visit the Mansion

Step through the Ebenezer Maxwell Mansion front door and step into the world of nineteenth-century Philadelphians and the transforming world around them.

Surrounded by lavish gardens that reveal the minds of people living in a world of industrialization and social change, the mansion has been painstakingly restored to reveal the thoughts and minds of Philadelphia’s rising middle class in the period from the 1860s to the 1910s. Learn about the lives of the people who lived here, upstairs and downstairs.

The mansion is open for regularly scheduled tours Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday at noon, one, and two p.m. To reserve a spot, please use our online reservation page [HERE](https://www.tix.com/ticket-sales/ebenezermaxwellmansion/1714). Reservations are appreciated.

[MAKE RESERVATIONS ONLINE](https://www.tix.com/ticket-sales/ebenezermaxwellmansion/1714)

Group tours for six or more visitors are available any day. Call or email the mansion for prior arrangements,

All Maxwell Mansion guides have been vaccinated for Covid-19. The building is fully air conditioned.

[MORE INFORMATION](https://ebenezermaxwellmansion.org/visit/)

DON’T MISS OUT!

Be the first to get latest updates and exclusive content straight to your email inbox.

collections_text:
**[MAKE RESERVATIONS ONLINE](https://www.tix.com/ticket-sales/ebenezermaxwellmansion/1714)**

## **Join us for a Glorious Season at Maxwell Mansion**

Tour our Victorian mansion and experience daily life in the nineteenth century. We welcome you to join us for numerous events and activities!

**Maxwell Mansion offers tours** Thursdays through Sundays at noon, 1 p.m., and 2 p.m.

**Victorian Christmas Mansion Tours December 4 – January 4.** Reservations requested.

**NO TOURS NEW YEAR’S DAY: THURSDAY, JANUARY 1, 2026. Tours resume Friday.**

[MORE INFORMATION](https://ebenezermaxwellmansion.org/visit/)

### [Support the Mansion](https://ebenezermaxwellmansion.org/support-the-mansion/)

### [Visit Us](https://ebenezermaxwellmansion.org/visit/)

### [Upcoming Events](https://ebenezermaxwellmansion.org/events/)

  * Welcome!
  * Blog
  * Newsletters

#### Welcome!

## Philadelphia’s Museum of

## Nineteenth-Century Everyday Life

The Victorian era was a time of massive societal transformations, complex ideas, and bold decorative choices, and visitors to Ebenezer Maxwell Mansion explore them. In addition to house tours, you can enjoy live Victorian Theatre and participate in unique programs and workshops. Stroll our gardens for a unique glimpse into our past. Our mission is to showcase Victorian-era Philadelphia through the architecture, grounds/gardens, and collections; and to educate, entertain, and inspire the public through onsite educational programming, tours, theatre produc...
